data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Šiauliai, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Šiauliai, Lithuania

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 237,832 cultural Christians in the state of Šiauliai to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Šiauliai.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Šiauliai, Lithuania who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tatar people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Šiauliai, Lithuania to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Spirit, please defend the 4,047 believers in Šiauliai against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Šiauliai, Lithuania that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.
